00189 /* For internal use in derived classes of <em>JoinProvider</em> to handle a accurate
00190 progress indication.
00191 Delegates only <em>OnExecuting</em> to the child-listener.
00192 <em>OnStarted</em> and <em>OnFinished</em> on the child-listener should be invoked
00193 directly by the <em>JoinProvider</em>. */
00194 class JoinProviderListener : public ProviderListener {
00195     typedef ProviderListener Base;
00196     public:
00198         JoinProviderListener(JoinProvider* provider, Provider* child_provider, ProviderListener* child_listener);
00199 
00201         virtual ~JoinProviderListener();
00202 
00205         virtual void OnExecuting();
00206 
00207         void SetChildProvider(Provider* child_provider) { m_child_provider = child_provider; }
00208 
00209     private:
00210         JoinProvider*       m_join_provider;
00211         Provider*           m_child_provider;
00212         ProviderListener*   m_child_listener;
00213 };  //lint !e1712
